PARAMETERS_LATEX: P_{{A1}}: \text{{Prices}}, P_{{A2}}: \text{{Prices}}, P_{{A3}}: \text{{Prices}}, R_{{A1}}: \text{{Costs}}, R_{{A2}}: \text{{Costs}}, R_{{A3}}: \text{{Costs}}, C_{{A1}}: \text{{ActivationCosts}}, C_{{A2}}: \text{{ActivationCosts}}, C_{{A3}}: \text{{ActivationCosts}}, B_{{A1}}: \text{{MinimumBatches}}, B_{{A2}}: \text{{MinimumBatches}}, B_{{A3}}: \text{{MinimumBatches}}, D_{{A1}}: \text{{Demand}}, D_{{A2}}: \text{{Demand}}, D_{{A3}}: \text{{Demand}}, L_{{total}}: \text{{TotalProductionLimit}}, T_{{fixed}}: \text{{FixedActivationTime}}
VARIABLES_LATEX: x_{{A1}} \geq 0, x_{{A2}} \geq 0, x_{{A3}} \geq 0, \forall A1, A2, A3 \in \{A1, A2, A3\}
